description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣

**Course Requirements:**

**Attendance and Participation 30%**

Punctual attendance and active participation are required. If you are habitually late or absent, points will be deducted and you may fail this course. If you have to miss a class, please inform me in advance. Participation also includes teamwork and group projects. 

**World Café (About-Me Presentation) 20%**

#Theme: Follow the guidelines from Presentation 1 (p. 49) and Presentation 2 (p. 87).

Pick one topic as your own presentation topic.

#Details: 2-3 mins. Use visual aids (photos, posters, etc.).

**In-class Quizzes 20%**

**Final exam (or Group presentation) 20%**

**Self-Study Project/ Learning Protfolio 10% (and bonus)**

**\*** This is to encourage students to use English outside the classroom. You are encouraged to devote at least 10 hours on this project. Participate in the following events, or attend a talk, an event, a show, a competition etc. in which English is the main language. Submit a list/ summary of what you do at the end of the semester. This list should include information such as date, duration, details and any other crucial information.

Here are a few suggestions for you to consider:

1\. 英語自學教室 (本部樸101) Record the details of your visit.

2\. 英語聊天室 (本部樸102) Record the details of your visit.

3\. Lexile Reading Project

4\. Study notes from the textbook

5\. Others
